member.name: KERB_CHANGEPASSWORD_REQUEST
member.summary: The KERB_CHANGEPASSWORD_REQUEST structure contains information used to change a password.

member.name: KERB_CHANGEPASSWORD_REQUEST.DomainName
member.summary: UNICODE_STRING that contains the domain name of the account for which to change the password.

member.name: KERB_CHANGEPASSWORD_REQUEST.AccountName
member.summary: UNICODE_STRING that contains the account name of the account for which to change the password.

member.name: KERB_CHANGEPASSWORD_REQUEST.OldPassword
member.summary: UNICODE_STRING that contains the old password to be changed.

member.name: KERB_CHANGEPASSWORD_REQUEST.NewPassword
member.summary: UNICODE_STRING that contains the new password.

member.name: KERB_CHANGEPASSWORD_REQUEST.Impersonating
member.summary: TRUE if the client is impersonating another security principal. Otherwise, false.
